{{also|Nur}} ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # A hard [[knot]] in [[wood]]; a [[knur]] or [[knurl]]. # {{lb|en|obsolete}} A hard [[knob]] of wood used in playing [[hockey]]. #* W. Howitt #*: I think I'm as hard as a '''nur''', and as tough as whitleather. {{Webster 1913}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=nru|URN|run|urn}} ---- ==Albanian== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|sq|tr|nur}}, from {{der|sq|ar|نور|gloss=light}}.{{R:sq:Topalli|page=1069}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|sq|[nuɾ]}} ===Noun=== {{sq-noun|m|nure|nuri|nuret}} # [[facial]] [[expression]], [[face]], [[appearance]] # [[dazzling]] [[beauty]] # [[outward]] [[appearance]] (of a person) ====Derived terms==== * {{l|sq|nurbardhë}} * {{l|sq|nurmadh}} * {{l|sq|nursëz}} * {{l|sq|nurshëm}} * {{l|sq|nurzi}} ===References=== ---- ==Esperanto== ===Etymology=== From {{der|eo|de|nur}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|eo|Eo-nur.ogg|Audio}} ===Adverb=== {{eo-head}} # [[only]], [[just]] #* '''1888''', L. L. Zamenhof, ''Dua Libro de l' Lingvo Internacia'', [http://www.gutenberg.org/etext/20006 Project Gutenberg transcription] #*: Se mi '''nur''' estus sana, mi estus tute kontenta. #*:: If '''only''' I would be healthy, I would be fully content. {{eo BRO|1}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From late {{inh|de|gmh|nuor}}, contracted from older {{m|gmh|niwer}}, {{m|gmh|newære}}, from {{inh|de|goh|niwāri}}, {{m|goh|ni}} {{m|goh|wāri}} (“were it not”). Cognate with {{cog|yi|נאָר}}, {{cog|nl|maar}}, {{cog|ang|nǣre}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/nuːɐ̯/}} * {{audio|de|De-nur fcm.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-nur.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|uːɐ̯}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[only]], [[just]], [[merely]], [[simply]] #: {{syn|de|bloß|allein}} #: '''''Nur''' reife Kirschen dürfen auf den Kuchen.'' #:: '''Only''' ripe cherries may go on the cake. #: ''Du musst '''nur''' die Werte eingeben und den Rest macht der Computer.'' #:: You '''just''' have to enter the values and the computer will do the rest. # [[ever]]; [[at all]] #: {{syn|de|immer|überhaupt}} #: ''Ich helfe dir, wo ich '''nur''' kann.'' #:: I’ll help you wher'''ever''' I can. # [[however]], [[though]] #: {{syn|de|allerdings|jedoch}} #: ''Wir könnten es versuchen. '''Nur''' wären die Risiken sehr hoch.'' #:: We could try. The risks would be very high, '''however.''' ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|nur zu}} * {{l|de|nur nicht}} ===Conjunction=== {{head|de|conjunction}} # {{lb|de|chiefly|_|colloquial}} [[but]] #: ''Ich wär auf jeden Fall dabei, '''nur''' ich hab echt keine Zeit.'' #:: I’d definitely come along, '''but''' I really don’t have the time. ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|aber}} ---- ==Ido== ===Etymology=== {{io-bor|eo=nur|||nur}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|io|/nur/}} ===Adverb=== {{head|io|adverb}} # [[only]], [[merely]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|io|nura}} ---- ==Malay== ===Etymology=== From {{der|ms|ar|نُور}}. ===Noun=== {{ms-noun}} # [[light]] ---- ==Novial== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|nov|eo|nur}}, from {{der|nov|de|nur}}. ===Adverb=== {{head|nov|adverb}} # [[only]], [[just]] ---- ==Nzadi== ===Noun=== {{nzd-noun|núr|núr}} # [[body]] ===Further reading=== * {{R:nzd:Crane}} {{topics|nzd|Anatomy}} ---- ==Polish== {{wikipedia|nury|lang=pl}} [[Image:Gavia arctica1.jpg|thumb|nur]] ===Pronunciation=== * {{pl-IPA}} ===Noun=== {{pl-noun|m-an}} # [[loon]] (bird of order [[Gaviiformes]]) # [[dive]], [[plunge]] (a jump into water) ====Declension==== {{pl-decl-noun-masc-ani|nu|r}} ====Related terms==== * {{qualifier|verbs}} {{l|pl|nurzać}}, {{l|pl|nurkować}} * {{qualifier|nouns}} {{l|pl|nur}}, {{l|pl|nurek}}, {{l|pl|nurkowanie}}, {{l|pl|nurnik}}, {{l|pl|nurzanie}}, {{l|pl|nurzaniec}}, {{l|pl|nurzec}}, {{l|pl|nurzyk}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:pl:WSJP}} * {{R:PWN}} [[Category:pl:Loons]] ---- ==Scottish Gaelic== ===Preposition=== {{head|gd|preposition}} # [[in]] [[your]] {{gloss|plural and formal singular}} ====Usage notes==== * Adds '''n-''' to the following word if it begins with a vowel. ====See also==== * {{l|gd|na}} * {{l|gd|nad}} * {{l|gd|nam}} * {{l|gd|nan}} * {{l|gd|nar}} ---- ==Turkish== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|tr|ar|نُور}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|tr|/nuɾ/}} ===Noun=== {{tr-noun|u|lar}} # {{lb|tr|Islam}} The Holy Light ====Declension==== {{tr-infl-noun-c|u}}
